name: OutOfColors
description: The VR game with a '90s feeling - grab your remote control and race for color spray trophies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 2 GB available space Additional Notes: You need HTC Vive or Oculus Rift + Touch Headset
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
